document_data.caption: The lands around Zundle.
document_data.name: Zundle
document_data.mainbody: rsistent rumors spread that years after the village was razed, a [[priest]] of [[Waukeen]] stole a temple's treasury in [[Westgate]] and buried it in a cattle paddock somewhere around Zundle. Astute historians noted that the event as described was impossible, as the village was never resettled or inhabited after being destroyed.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Persistent rumors spread that years after the village was razed, a [[priest]] of [[Waukeen]] stole a temple's treasury in [[Westgate]] and buried it in a cattle paddock somewhere around Zundle. Astute historians noted that the event as described was impossible, as the village was never resettled or inhabited after being destroyed.
